desc: Our shoppe offers the highest quality yarn, patterns, books, needles, and all you need for your knitting and crocheting projects. Doreen Marquart's talents and expertise are available to her customers through her beautiful store and shopping experience. Find the yarn, patterns, and advice you need.

layout.text:
Your one-stop source for high quality yarns and supplies. We are dedicated exclusively to fulfilling the needs of knitters and crocheters. The yarns, patterns, books, and accessories are of the finest quality, and all hand picked by Doreen Marquart.
Our current hours are...
Monday, Wednesday, Friday & Saturday: 9:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m.
Closed Sunday, Tuesday, & Thursday
Reminder! Online Ordering/Shipping & Curbside Pick-up is also available!
